summary:
The PlayStation 2 (PS2) is a popular video game console made by Sony. It came out in 2000 and was the best-selling console ever, with over 157 million sold worldwide. PS2 was powerful for its time, with a special processor called the Emotion Engine. It could play games from the original PlayStation, too.

The console had a long life, with new games released even after its newer version, the PlayStation 3, came out. Sony stopped making PS2s in 2013 after more than 12 years.
title: PlayStation 2
